results.title: Recollection
results.creator_credit: Jessica Steinmann, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Jessica Steinmann reflects on a time she can remember very little of, when an accident caused her to be unconscious for around twenty minutes.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jessica Steinmann, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Our time
results.creator_credit: Evangelos Thiveos, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: For Evangelos Thiveos, time with the family is centred around dinner time, where everyone gets to talk about their day, while ‘stuffing their faces’ with the copious amounts of food prepared earlier.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Evangelos Thiveos, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: True friend
results.creator_credit: Elizabeth Phan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Moving to a new city and making new friends is never easy, and Elizabeth Phan found it particularly difficult. Gradually, though, Phan was able to learn the meaning of the words ‘true friend’.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Elizabeth Phan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Building
results.creator_credit: Dale Smith, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Dale Smith dedicates her story to her dad, a man of infinite creativity and resourcefulness. His inventiveness extended to building houses, caravans, mobile homes, trailers and, above all, a family who adore him.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Dale Smith, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: A Story to inspire
results.creator_credit: Tanika Deemal-Parker, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Tanika Deemal-Parker has been singing all her life. She has been encouraged by her mum to take her singing further and, when doubts set in, it was her mum that helped her through with some words of wisdom.

results.title: Step by step
results.creator_credit: Sam Kluk, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Sam Kluk loved his beautiful town of Kuranda in Northern Queensland. Unfortunately, there was another side to the quiet town and Kluk was determined to take every opportunity to escape it.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sam Kluk, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: My beach
results.creator_credit: Richard Sagigi, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Life, for Richard Sagigi, was never always easy. Times at school when he was getting into trouble forced him to move to another school. But he knows that he can reconnect with himself on the beach where his family live, digging for turtle eggs, learning about animal conservation and meeting people from different cultures.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Richard Sagigi, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Life, for Richard Sagigi, was never always easy. Times at school when he was getting into trouble forced him to move to another school. But he knows that he can reconnect with himself on the beach where his family live, digging for turtle eggs, learning about animal conservation and meeting people from different cultures.
description_for_label: Life, for Richard Sagigi, was never always easy. Times at school when he was getting into trouble forced him to move to another school. But he knows that he can reconnect with himself on the beach where his family live, digging for turtle eggs, learning about animal conservation and meeting people from different cultures.

results.title: Life in the Kimberleys
results.creator_credit: Rhys Bedford, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Rhys Bedford has a lot of doors open to him, now that he is the recipient of a scholarship at Hale College in Western Australia. But it is when he returns to his family in Kununurra that Bedford gets to explore and reconnect with his country and heritage.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Rhys Bedford, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Rhys Bedford has a lot of doors open to him, now that he is the recipient of a scholarship at Hale College in Western Australia. But it is when he returns to his family in Kununurra that Bedford gets to explore and reconnect with his country and heritage.

results.title: Young and proud
results.creator_credit: Leah Latham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: A young, successful and proud Yamatji woman, Leah Latham attributes the person she is today to growing up with different cultures. She acknowledges it can be hard being a mix of English and Indigenous cultures, but believes it has also made her the person she is today.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Leah Latham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: A young, successful and proud Yamatji woman, Leah Latham attributes the person she is today to growing up with different cultures. She acknowledges it can be hard being a mix of English and Indigenous cultures, but believes it has also made her the person she is today.
